channel.title: rat-os/ratos
channel.description: An OS focusing on making klipper more approachable

item.title: WARNING: BED_MESH behavior is changing in RatOS v2.0
item.description: WARNING: the bed_mesh behavior will change when you update RatOS through mainsail. Read more about the new behavior here: https://rat-os.vercel.app/docs/configuration/macros#bed-mesh-calibration
